content: get ready to fall in love with henry the large sleepy time crochet gnome and his coordinating star and moon pillows this project includes three separate pdf patterns to make the gnome the star pillow and the moon pillow besides being absolutely adorable this oversized crochet gnome approximately 21 inches tall without his hat works up quickly for its generous size using blanket yarn he is stuffed with five pounds of poly-fil making him oh so squishable and irresistible if you re a gnome lover or know someone who is get ready to impress the recipient of this project is going to love you forever and you re going to love making him and his coordinating star and moon pillows pattern information + your pdf purchase includes written instructions and helpful photographs to aid in construction + the patterns are written in english using us crochet terminology + the patterns are formatted to have one featured image at the beginning of the pattern for reference important images for construction within the pattern and all other full-sized images at the end for easy optional printing skills needed + the skill level needed is advanced beginner + the techniques you will need to know include chain single_crochet slip_stitch increase invisible and regular single_crochet decrease front and back post double_crochet and the adjustable magic ring materials needed to complete the sleepy time gnome star and moon you will need + blanket yarn in your choice of colors about 1 341 yds/ m of 6-super bulky + a size j/10 6 0 mm crochet hook + stitch markers + tapestry needle + 5 pounds of poly-fil stuffing + scissors + a chopstick or something similar to help stuff small spaces + a 2 5-inch pom-pom maker finished measurements + the large sleepy time crochet gnome measures approximately 21 inches 53 cm tall not including the hat and approximately 41 5 inches 105 cm around + the blanket yarn crochet star measures approximately 10 inches 25 cm from top point to bottom point the center portion is approximately 5 inches 12 7 cm across + the blanket yarn crochet moon measures approximately 9 inches 23 cm in diameter thank you thank you for supporting my small business it means the world wishing you a blessed day as you spread kindness and creativity happy crocheting find more this pattern along with many other designs can be found here on ravelry and the blog at
